products.name: POLARIS 9R RMK KHAOS 155 SLASH (S24TFG9BE)
products.description:
The Matryx Slash has a lightweight, tapered tunnel that provides unparalleled traction and lift in all conditions.

The all-new Matryx Slash’s short, tapered track tunnel allows the machine to dig deeper into the snow without getting stuck, maintaining forward motion and traction even in the steepest, deepest conditions.

The RMK React Suspension offers the rider the most precise and effortless handling in deep snow. Initiate a sidehill ride effortlessly and experience less fatigue with the most predictable ride. It features a track width of 36″-38″, an anti-roll bar designed for predictable handling, and forged A-arms and spindles optimized for strength and durability.

The new rear suspension geometry provides balance and traction for easy handling, control, and the best responsiveness in all riding zones.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 392,3cm
Groove height 6 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 display
Steering wheel U-shaped, steel, with J-handles, low mountain strap

products.name: Lynx Brutal RE 400mm 3900 900 ACE Turbo R (SZSF)
products.description:
Brutal is one of the most striking snowmobiles in the Lynx model range. It combines the features of utility and mountain models and is suitable for any purpose – from leisurely walks to conquering steep slopes.

The snowmobile has a two-stroke engine. The same one that is installed on the “mountain” – this is a 165-horsepower Rotax 850 E-TEC with additional accelerator injectors. It easily scrolls even a large utility track off-road: here it is 500 mm wide and 3923 mm long with large and unusual for “utility” 60-millimeter lugs, providing excellent cross-country ability in deep snow.

In terms of transmission, the snowmobile is similar to mountain models: there is no downshift, electronic reverse (engine start in the opposite direction). The leading pulley of the variator is pDrive with the ability to quickly adjust.

An additional radiator prevents the engine from overheating when riding on a road with little snow or ice. The Brutal also has a battery (which means it can be started with an electric starter) and a large 7.2-inch display.

The rear suspension is utilitarian – EasyRide, but without a spring-loaded carriage. It is equipped with KYB 46 Plus Kashima shock absorbers. The front one is LFS+ with A-shaped levers, shock absorbers are KYB PRO 36 EA-3 R
Kashima. The ski track is 996 mm.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 392,3cm
Groove height 6 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 display
Steering wheel U-shaped, steel, with J-handles, low mountain strap

products.name: Ski-Doo Expedition LE 20″ 900 ACE Turbo (ACSG) (TEST)
products.description:
The snowmobile will be an excellent choice for tourism, long walks and work. The “LE” package has everything you need: Multi-LinQ mounting system, 4.5-inch display, additional radiator, deep snow footrests with large holes, removable passenger seat with heated grips and a towing hitch. The factory-installed batteries include a high-capacity battery, a high windshield (585 mm) with side deflectors, hinged mirrors, a connector for connecting a heated driver’s helmet visor and a low handle on the steering wheel.

The model is equipped with a four-stroke Rotax engine with a volume of 899 cm³ and a power of 130 hp, which is distinguished by excellent traction and quiet operation, and due to Advanced Combustion Technology, it consumes fuel economically.

The SC-5U rear suspension has a breakable “heel”, which facilitates reversing. If necessary, it can be fixed in the lower position – for towing, for example.

The front suspension, unlike the Scandic line of snowmobiles, is lever-type. It works better on uneven surfaces and is more comfortable at high speed. The wide track of the skis – 1000 mm – increases the stability of the snowmobile, making it less wobbly when maneuvering.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 899 cm3
Track width 50,8 cm
Track length 391,2 cm
Power 130 hp
Instrument panel 4,5 widescreen digital display
Steering wheel Standard with J-handles

products.name: Lynx Brutal RE 900 ACE Turbo R Powdermax II (SZSG)
products.description:
Brutal is one of the most striking snowmobiles in the Lynx model range. It combines the features of utility and mountain models and is suitable for any purpose – from leisurely walks to conquering steep slopes.

The snowmobile has a two-stroke engine. The same one that is installed on the “mountain” – this is a 165-horsepower Rotax 850 E-TEC with additional accelerator injectors. products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 392,3cm
Groove height 6 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 display
Steering wheel U-shaped, steel, with J-handles, low mountain strap

products.name: Lynx Commander STD 900 ACE Turbo (LHSB)
products.description:
The Commander 900 ACE Turbo is a great choice for work, walks and travel. The LTD package includes a 7.2-inch widescreen digital display, a modular two-seater seat, a shovel with a saw and a 70-liter trunk. The side panels in a more sporty style make it easier to move the snowmobile in deep snow.

The four-stroke 130-horsepower Rotax 900 ACE Turbo engine is ideal for a utility-tourist model – it is economical and powerful, quiet and has a clean exhaust. Increased power compared to the naturally aspirated engine made the snowmobile more dynamic.

The downshift provided in the EasyShift gearbox comes in handy when more efficient traction is required at low speeds – for example, when towing a heavy load or moving slowly through deep snow.

The EasyRide rear suspension features a spring-loaded carriage that lifts to facilitate reversing in deep snow and lowers when accelerating, increasing the contact patch of the track with the snow (for example, this will come in handy when conquering a steep elephant). The suspension stiffness is adjusted with a special wing nut to quickly prepare the snowmobile for riding alone or with a passenger.

At the front, there is an LFS suspension with curved levers to increase ground clearance – with them, the snowmobile is less likely to hit an obstacle. The ski track is 996 mm. It is narrower than that of the Grand Tourer models, due to which the snowmobile is less stable, but more maneuverable.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 899 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 392,3cm
Groove height 4.4 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 display
Steering wheel U-shaped, steel, with J-handles, low mountain strap

products.name: Maverick R X rs SmartShox
products.description:
Turbocharged, liquid-cooled, Rotax® ACE (Advanced Combustion Efficiency) three-cylinder engine with integrated intercooler and high-flow air cleaner.

Lockable front differential with exclusive Smart-Lok technology*. True 4-Mode traction control system: 2WD / 4WD with lockable front differential / 4WD ROCK / 4WD TRAIL, Rotax DCT automatic transmission.

Front suspension type: Double A-arms, high-mounted knuckles made of strong aluminum. Rear suspension type: Heavy-duty 4-link with heavy-duty arms
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 240 hp
Weight 1020 kg
Clearance 43,2 cm
Wheels 32-inch tires with 16-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 50 L
Suspension Front 635 mm, rear 660 mm

images.name: Maverick R X rs ja SmartShox

products.name: Maverick Sport MAX DPS 1000R T
products.description:
This is a sport-tourist ATV, which is distinguished primarily by increased engine power, long-travel suspensions, a more spacious interior and an increased track width. All this makes the vehicle more comfortable and stable. It is suitable not only for leisurely walks, but also for fast runs over rough terrain.

MAX in the name of the ATV means the presence of four seats and a long wheelbase, which increases the smoothness of the ride, makes the vehicle more comfortable when driving over uneven surfaces. The engine on this model and the all-wheel drive give the freedom and opportunity for new discoveries. The downshifting gear has an increased gear ratio for better traction at low speed, which will be useful when overcoming mud sections or difficult terrain. To prevent the ATV from getting stuck when slipping or hanging wheels, an automatic lock is provided.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 95 hp
Weight 770 kg
Clearance 30,5 cm
Wheels 28-inch tires with 14-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 38 L
Load capacity 136 kg

products.name: Traxter XU HD10 T
products.description:
The model differs from the others in the line by its increased wheelbase, a body twice as large with removable side walls, and a lower luggage compartment with a volume of 316.5 liters. All this makes the ATV even more suitable for hunting and work related to the transportation of heavy and bulky cargo.

The engine is a 976 cc with a capacity of 82 hp. Due to the high torque at low revs, it allows the vehicle to tow more than a ton without problems. Also, for better traction, a low gear with an increased gear ratio (Extra-L) is provided.

One of the features of all “Traxters” is the ability to unlock the rear differential so that the ATV does not blow up soft ground during maneuvers and turns along a smaller radius.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 82 hp
Weight 831.5 kg
Clearance 33 cm
Wheels 28-inch tires with 14-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 40 L
Load capacity 454 kg

products.name: Outlander XMR 1000R
products.description:
A mud version of the liter Outlander ATV. It features a snorkel, radiator extension and high ground clearance (330 mm). The factory-installed 30-inch ITP Cryptid tires with powerful lugs allow you to drive on muddy dirt roads with puddles and deep ruts.

A responsive 91-horsepower engine can operate in 3 modes: standard, Sport (for active driving) and ECO (for work). The transmission is familiar to Outlander ATVs, but with modified gear ratios for extreme off-road conditions. You can turn on all-wheel drive, a “low gear” and a Visco-4Lok differential lock for better cross-country ability.

The package includes everything for comfortable and safe trips: three-mode power steering, power bumpers, winch, mud steps, wheel arch extensions and a rear luggage rack for 90 kg. There is also modern electronics: a widescreen 7.6″ display, D.E.S.S anti-theft system, a socket for gadgets and bright LED headlights.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 91 hp
Weight 459 kg
Clearance 33 cm
Wheels 30-inch tires with 14-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 20,5 L
Load capacity 90 kg

products.name: Outlander MAX XT-P 1000 T
products.description:
The Outlander MAX XT-P 1000R is the best choice for those looking for an ATV for both riding with a passenger and extreme solo riding. First of all, it is distinguished by Fox† 1.5 Podium QS3 shock absorbers with three-position adjustment. By choosing a more sporty mode, you can achieve excellent ATV control and reach a speed on rough terrain that is inaccessible to most stock vehicles. At the same time, the suspension can be made soft for calm rides.

To prevent the tire from separating from the disk during a side impact or entering a sharp turn, the ATV is equipped with beadlocks. Also in the basic configuration there is a 7.6-inch digital display, a winch, reinforced bumpers, hand guards, arch extensions and power steering. 26-inch ITP Terracross tires are adapted for fast driving on hard surfaces, but also cope well with mud routes.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 91 hp
Weight 408 kg
Clearance 27,9 cm
Wheels 26-inch tires with 14-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 20,5 L
Load capacity Front platform: 45 kg. Rear platform: 90 kg

Wheels 26-inch tires with 14-inch alloy wheels
Fuel tank capacity 20,5 L
Load capacity Front platform: 45 kg. Rear platform: 90 kg

products.name: Outlander 6X6 XU+ 1000 T
products.description:
Outlander 6X6 XU+ 1000 T is an excellent choice for fishermen, hunters and all those who need to transport heavy loads. Six wheels, each of which in 6WD mode receives the power of a “liter” engine, allow you to confidently overcome long mud climbs and other off-road obstacles. The luggage racks can carry a total of up to 363 kg, and the maximum towed load is 907 kg. Due to its small width (122 cm), the ATV follows the tracks of conventional four-wheel ATVs, which allows you to get into the most inaccessible places.

In addition to a powerful 80-horsepower engine, the ATV has excellent traction due to a reduction gear with an increased gear ratio. The risk of getting stuck is reduced by the limited-slip front differential Visco-Lok QE.

The rear suspension (TTI2) has a quick-release anti-roll bar. With it, the ATV is more controllable and stable, without it, the suspension travel is longer. The long wheelbase (208 cm) ensures high safety on slopes.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity

80 hp

Weight

576 kg

Clearance

27,9 cm

Wheels

26-inch tires with 12-inch alloy wheels

Fuel tank capacity

20,5 L

Load capacity

Front platform: 45 kg. Rear platform: 318 kg

products.name: Lynx Commander RE 900 ACE Turbo R (LFSA)
products.description:
The Commander RE is the fastest snowmobile in the Commander line. It is equipped with a top-of-the-line four-stroke Rotax engine with 180 hp, so it accelerates at the level of sports models. It also has advanced shock absorbers – KYB PRO 36 EA-3 R / 46 EA-3 R – they allow you to quickly and comfortably rush over bumps without losing control.

The EasyShift gearbox has a downshift, which is useful when more efficient traction at low speeds is required.

The EasyRide+ rear suspension is suitable for off-road and packed trails. It has a longer stroke than its predecessor, and a smaller angle of attack for a smooth ride and cross-country ability.

The track, as befits a snowmobile for deep snow, is large – 500 mm wide and 3923 mm long. The height of the lugs is 44 mm.

products.name: Ski-Doo Expedition SE 900 ACE Turbo R 2025 (AYSE)
products.description:
Expedition in the “SE” configuration is more comfortable and practical. It has everything that the “LE” models are equipped with, and their unique features are a rear suspension with air inflation, a widescreen 7.8-inch digital display, a large LinQ luggage case with a volume of 135 liters and an adjustable steering wheel riser.

The model is equipped with a four-stroke Rotax engine with a volume of 899 cm³, which is distinguished by excellent traction and quiet operation, and due to Advanced Combustion Technology, it consumes fuel economically. The turbocharger made it possible to achieve a power of 180 hp, which made the snowmobile more agile.

The SC-5U rear suspension has a breakaway “heel”, which makes it easier to reverse. If necessary, it can be fixed in the lower position – for towing, for example.

The front suspension, unlike the Scandic line of snowmobiles, is lever-type. It works better on uneven surfaces and is more comfortable at high speed. The wide ski track – 1000 mm – increases the stability of the snowmobile, making it less wobbly when maneuvering.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 899 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 391.2 cm
Groove height 3.8 cm
Instrument panel 7.8-inch panoramic display
Steering wheel Standard with J-handles

products.name: Ski-Doo Expedition SE 900 ACE Turbo R (AYSH)
products.description:
Expedition in the “SE” configuration is more comfortable and practical. It has everything that the “LE” models are equipped with, and their unique features are a rear suspension with air inflation, a widescreen 7.2-inch digital display, a large LinQ luggage case with a volume of 135 liters and an adjustable steering wheel riser.

The model is equipped with a four-stroke Rotax engine with a volume of 899 cm³, which is distinguished by excellent traction and quiet operation, and due to Advanced Combustion Technology, it consumes fuel economically. The turbocharger made it possible to achieve a power of 180 hp, which made the snowmobile more agile.

The SC-5U rear suspension has a breakaway “heel”, which makes it easier to reverse. If necessary, it can be fixed in the lower position – for towing, for example.

The front suspension, unlike the Scandic line of snowmobiles, is lever-type. It works better on uneven surfaces and is more comfortable at high speed. The wide ski track – 1000 mm – increases the stability of the snowmobile, making it less wobbly when maneuvering.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 899 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 391.2 cm
Groove height 3.8 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 widescreen digital display
Steering wheel Standard with J-handles

products.name: Lynx Brutal RE 900 ACE Turbo R Powdermax II (SZSP)
products.description:
Brutal is one of the most striking snowmobiles in the Lynx model range. It combines the features of utility and mountain models and is suitable for any purpose – from leisurely walks to conquering steep slopes.

The snowmobile has a two-stroke engine. The same one that is installed on the “mountain” – this is a 165-horsepower Rotax 850 E-TEC with additional accelerator injectors. It easily scrolls even a large utility track off-road: here it is 500 mm wide and 3923 mm long with large and unusual for “utility” 60-millimeter lugs, providing excellent cross-country ability in deep snow.

In terms of transmission, the snowmobile is similar to mountain models: there is no downshift, electronic reverse (engine start in the opposite direction). The leading pulley of the variator is pDrive with the ability to quickly adjust.

An additional radiator prevents the engine from overheating when riding on a road with little snow or ice. The Brutal also has a battery (which means it can be started with an electric starter) and a large 7.2-inch display.

The rear suspension is utilitarian – EasyRide, but without a spring-loaded carriage. It is equipped with KYB 46 Plus Kashima shock absorbers. The front one is LFS+ with A-shaped levers, shock absorbers are KYB PRO 36 EA-3 R
Kashima. The ski track is 996 mm.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Track width 50 cm
Track length 392,3cm
Groove height 6 cm
Instrument panel 7.2 display
Steering wheel U-shaped, steel, with J-handles, low mountain strap

products.name: Ski-Doo Expedition Xtreme 850 E-Tec 154" (ADNC)
products.description:
Expedition XTREME is the only sport-utility snowmobile in the line. One of its main differences is the two-stroke 165-horsepower Rotax 850 E-TEC engine. This is installed on mountain and sport models, it provides instant power gain and excellent dynamics. In addition, the engine is lighter than four-stroke engines, which has a positive effect on controllability.

Another important feature of the model is the KYB Pro 36 rear shock absorber with a remote reservoir and adjustable compression, designed for high-speed off-road driving.

Less significant differences from other Expedition models are a low mountain strap, flexible hand protection and Pilot DS 3 skis, adapted for aggressive riding.

Otherwise, Expedition XTREME is very similar to its utility-tourist “brothers”. It has an SC-5U rear suspension with a breakable “heel”, which makes it easier to move in reverse. If necessary, it can be fixed in the lower position – for towing, for example.

The front suspension is lever-type. Unlike the telescopic one, it handles unevenness better and is more comfortable at high speed. The wide track of the skis – 975 or 1020 mm – increases the stability of the snowmobile, making it less rollable during maneuvers.

The EasyShift gearbox has a downshift, which will be useful when towing heavy loads, moving slowly in deep snow and overcoming steep climbs.

The track is large for maximum cross-country ability. Its length is 3912 mm, and its width is 508 mm. The height of the lugs is 46 mm.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Track width 50,8 cm
Track length 391,2 cm
Groove height 4,6 cm
Instrument panel 4.5 inch digital display
Steering wheel U-shaped aluminum handlebar with J-shaped grips / low handlebar grip

products.name: Ski-Doo Summit X with Expert Pkg 850 E-TEC Turbo R (TSSH)
products.description:
The Summit in the Expert package has several differences from the standard models: an advanced KYB PRO 36 Easy-Adjust rear shock absorber, adjustable suspension travel limiter, a shortened steering riser (120 mm), a shorter and lower seat, a narrower ski track (864 mm), and hand protection. Otherwise, it is the same mountain snowmobile with a lightweight design, a narrow frame, a shortened tunnel and a low landing.

We remind you that the Summit is lighter than the Freeride models, but it has lower-level shock absorbers. The engine is a two-stroke – a turbocharged 165-horsepower Rotax 850 E-TEC. It differs from the “aspirated” in that the power does not fade when gaining altitude up to 2400 meters. An instant response to gas is provided by additional accelerator injectors that supply fuel at the moment of sharp opening of the throttle at medium and high speeds. Also, the leading pulley of the pDrive variator with double rollers with needle bearings instead of sliding linings has a positive effect on the dynamics.

The T-Motion mountain suspension features a floating bogie on a hinged joint. Thanks to this feature, it can shift relative to the snowmobile to the left and right by 4 °. This makes it easier for the rider to put the snowmobile on the edge and saves energy. In addition, the control is facilitated by the PowderMax Light (FlexEdge) track with flexible edges. Its length is 3912 mm, width – 406 mm, lug height – 76 mm. The RAS 3 suspension with A-shaped levers is used at the front. Skis – Pilot DS 3.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Number of cylinders 2
Rear suspension travel 239 mm
Groove height 76 cm
Instrument panel 4.5 non-tilting digital display
Steering wheel U-shaped aluminum handlebar with J-shaped grips / flexible hand guards

products.name: Ski-Doo Freeride Standard 850 E-TEC Turbo R (VDSF)
products.description:
The 2024 Summit received the RevGen5 platform. Like the RevGen4, it features a centralized mass, but it has become even narrower – by 51 mm on the left side and by 25 mm on the right. The body shape is now more streamlined. All this makes the new mountain sled even more passable and easier to control.

The tMotion XT mountain suspension, compared to the usual TMotion, has a longer front arm and a rear arm shifted back. This improved performance and increased travel by 25 mm. The weight has decreased by 1.4 kg.

The engine is the most powerful in the industry – Rotax 850 E-TEC Turbo R – it develops 180 hp at an altitude of 2.4 km and more. The increase in power at sea level relative to the “aspirated” is 15 hp. The fourth engine mount reduces vibration, which also has a positive effect on the durability of the variator belt. Instant response to gas is provided by additional accelerator injectors that supply fuel at the moment of sharp opening of the throttle at medium and high speeds.

Summit in the Expert configuration has several differences from the standard models: an advanced rear shock absorber KYB PRO 36 Easy-Adjust, adjustable suspension travel limiter, a shortened steering riser (120 mm), a shorter and lower seat, a narrower ski track (864 mm), as well as hand protection. Otherwise, this is the same mountain snowmobile with a lightweight design, a narrow frame, a shortened tunnel and a low landing.
products.short_description:
Engine capacity 849 cm3
Number of cylinders 2
Rear suspension travel 258 mm
Groove height 76 cm
Instrument panel Colour 10.25 touchscreen display with BRP Connect system
Steering wheel U-shaped aluminum handlebar with J-shaped grips
